comprehensive_vulnerabilities.name: Unnecessary Services Running
comprehensive_vulnerabilities.description: Non-essential network services enabled
fix_commands: systemctl list-unit-files | grep enabled | grep -E '(telnet|ftp|rsh|rlogin)' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -r systemctl disable
systemctl stop $(systemctl list-unit-files | grep enabled | grep -E '(telnet|ftp|rsh|rlogin)' | awk '{print $1}')
